description:
Serving innocent accident victims and their families throughout St. Lucie County and beyond from our law office in Port St. Lucie, Florida, the attorneys at Frankl Kominsky Injury Lawyers are fully committed to fighting hard on your behalf to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve following a preventable tragedy caused by someone else's negligence.

Regarded as one of South Florida's leading personal injury practices, our law firm has three total offices across our region. During our time in practice, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients who have been adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, nursing home and elder abuse, dangerous property conditions, medical malpractice and more. Honored for their success, our attorneys have earned memberships in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum along with consistent top rankings and endorsements from their peers.

Among our most notable accolades, our attorneys have received inclusions on The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40 list as well as designations as being among the top 5% of attorneys in our region. Moreover, we have also received "Superb" ratings on Avvo along with numerous testimonials and referrals from those we have served, and we find great reward in being able to help so many in our communities during their most dire times of need.

You do not have to suffer alone. You can contact Frankl Kominsky Injury Lawyers to schedule a free initial consultation to find out how we can best assist you in securing a better future for yourself and your loved ones. We also currently offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your family safe and healthy.
